response.overview: In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring author is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious outsider. Trying to escape the ghosts of her past, she is swept away to a house that breathes, bleeds… and remembers.
response.tagline: Love makes monsters of us all.
response.title: Crimson Peak

titles.title: ปราสาทสีเลือด
